column4: how do i generate the files in /usr/share/locale-langpack/en_US/ ?
: try to reinstall the language-en package
tried reinstalling and regenerating no luck... anymore ideas?
: did you setup you locale to English?
: no errors on that... i think all you locales been created fine
whereas the en_GB has lots of stuff in it
: you need to set your locale to en_GB, the easiest way is to logout GNOMe, and choose English (UK) during logon
no i want to have en_US work
i think i found the problem
i ran gnome-language-selector and it said that languages are not fully installed... downloading files
